name: ZomBlood - test 1
description:
A zombie game still currently in progress but made with scratch

(and its HD)

game by XesierDEV . 

What'ss new ? 

in test 0.02:

I added music and removed laser sight. (performance issues)

I also made that the difficulty gets harder.

I also made so that zombies can spawn on the

left and right side so that you can sit in a corner

at the right side.
